UserRecordAccess.name: UserRecordAccess
UserRecordAccess.description: Represents a user’s access to a set of records.

HasAllAccess.description: Indicates whether a user can share the record.

HasDeleteAccess.description: Indicates whether a user has delete access to the record (true) or not (false).

HasEditAccess.description: Indicates whether a user has edit access to the record (true) or not (false).

HasTransferAccess.description: Indicates whether a user has transfer access to the record (true) or not (false).

HasReadAccess.description: Indicates whether a user has read access to the record (true) or not (false).

MaxAccessLevel.description: Indicates a user’s maximum level of access to a record.
